content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my outside deck of my house on eastern long island last saturday night having a smoke. observed very bright red ball approaching my house from the south about 20 degrees above horizon appearing out of nowhere. continued directly overheard and had no tail. detected a slight   flickering as it faded out. immediately second one in exact same flightpath appeared and flew over. then a third and fouth in exact sequence of about 1 minute each flew over same flightpath. these were not chinese lanterns. no wind, clear,temp 71 degrees. reminded me of a  helicopter speed and probaby over 1500 feet with no noise. it was not any type of manmade aircraft or meteor. i called to my son who saw 2 or 3 seconds of last fireball. his opinion is these so called fireballs are some kind of energy particles coming from the sun and entering earth's atmosphere. he may be right!
content.summary: Four bright red balls flew over home exactly 1 minute apart

content.detailedDescription: Son and i saw the lights to the east from our backyard in torrance.  the lights were in the direction of the long beach airport.  i am a pilot so often watch aircraft in the sky.  the color of the lights caught my attention. there were two red lights  slightly higher in the sky than the third.  the third was much brighter.  they were stationary at first with steady lights (no flashing position lights). i was looking carefully for any indication they could be a helicopter or airplane.  the brightest light abruptly started moving down and to the north about one to two extended palm widths, then abruptly stopped and hovered.  the two above also moved slightly but independently. all three hovered for a bit with the luminosity starting to fade in the upper lights and strengthen in the lower light.  next the ascended slowly a bit. the top two disappeared, faded out.  my son got our binoculars and we observed the brightest light of a while longer.  through the binoculars, the light appeared square with only one steady orange-red light.  where we live we are on the edge of where the nightly marine layer breaks up as it dissipates moving in an easterly direction.  there was some thin misty cloud cover that may explain why the upper two lights disappeared at first and the third light a bit later.  after they disappeared we continued to search the area with binoculars as the marine layer was clearing. i do not believe they moved off in the distance and faded out of sight because when they all disappeared, they were not changing position.  i am confident there were not conventional aircraft because when they did move it was abrupt and deliberate and then when hovering they did not move at all.  even a helicopter would not move as abruptly as these did.
content.summary: Three red orange lights, two starlike above, third very bright.  hovering then  moved position  rapidly then hovering with slow assent. then slowly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: three of us having a chat on the 2cnd floor porch of a condo looking out over the atlantic in key west (stock island to be exact). we had a 180 degree view of the ocean. at around 11pm a bright orange object just appeared in the middle of our view in the sky about 20 degrees above the horizon. it moved parallel to the horizon for 90 degrees of sky. the best description is it was comet-like...But was only about 1/2 mile away from us, we could discern a large dark (no lights) craft at the head, it appeared to float, but in a straight slow, horizontal path (parallel to the horizon). it left a trail of fire and spark...Sort of like a welders torch. the trail was bright and long..Left no smoke...Just sparks. even though the trail implies a sort of propulsion system the craft seemed to float. there also was another small dot of light above the craft in the front, which looked like a smaller craft. we watched it for about 2-3 minutes then the trail just went out, we could still make out a dark outline of a craft and it continued on the same flight path then went out of our visual range. no sound at all. it you could imagine a rocket moving sideways parallel and above the horizon it might be something like that except again it left no smoke...No sound and also shot sparks.
content.summary: Fiery sparks comet-like trail ufo - no sound apeared to have large dark craft at the head.

content.detailedDescription:
Once again i was watching the stars and seen blinking lights,
i thaught it was 2 air craft at first, but thay seemed to get closer
and than became one for about 3-4 sec. and split again. the one that split
came back to the east and the other remained to the west. the east one 
remained seen for about another 7sec. and the west for about 7sec. after that. than they were gone. the west did not move or change direction.
i did not know what i was watching but i had a uneasy feeling as they
dicipered. it was a star light night no real cloud cover to speek of.
content.summary: Watching  stars and observed 2 objects  than they became one than 2

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my friends porch talking about college, we had been watching the sky for shooting stars, planes, etc...I had been facing the west with my feet on the railings leaning back in the chair staring at the sky.  we saw several shooting stars pass by, planes, then i saw what looked like a star get brighter than the other ones around it.  this immediately caught both our attention, i stood up so i wasn't on a chair that wobbles to see it's direction and movement.  it wasn't moving more than a few hundred miles an hour, based on planes that had been passing by.  the object became extremely bright, then dimmed out to approximately the light a plane would give off, then repeated this three more times over approximately a minute and a half to two minutes.  i couldn't tell whether the it changed it's direction by the distance from us, but we both counted four separate extremely bright pulsating moments.  only one light was observed.  i didn't have my phone or a camera on me to record the event, but there were two observer's. my other is a friend and business partner of mine who is 58, and has owned a highly reputable business here in town for 30 years.  i am going to college for biotechnology, and have a great passion for astrophysics.  hope this helps. i can absolutely draws a sketch for you since i am a artist.
content.summary: Got very bright dimmed out, four separate times

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching the stars and seen a misty blue orb and
i dont know what it was so i just watched to see if i would see it again.
it only lasted about 1 1/2 - 2 secand it was gone. it went in a strait
line and in a ne. direction. i will do another report because i seen
unexplained lights about 2 nights before . i hope some one can tell me what i seen.
content.summary: I was watching the stars and it was where i was looking

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mom were on our way home at about 11:20. as we were approaching the exit ramp we witnessed a large group of starlight like lights. in the time we ascended the quarter mile exit ramp an additional  surplus of lights seemed to appear. there was approx 40. lights. 7 or so formed a linear line in the middle of the remaining amorphous cloud of lights. we exited the ramp and turned left trying to get  a better look.  we turned around and by the time we got back where they were again in our  view all the lights were gone. only twenty secs elapsed.
content.summary: Witnessed a large group of lights

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house and walked 20 feet to my car then saw a light in the night sky. thought for a moment it was the headlights of a plane, like i've seen before but it was much larger than that. if i held my hand up, it would be about the size of my pinky nail, and did not have any blinking/flashing lights that i could tell. the object seemed very high up. it was red-orange. it did not seem solid, like it was a fire ball. moving from the north-west to the east. lost it after it moved past the tree line. then less than a minute later a second one appeared right where the first one was spotted(same look). watched this one go past in the same path as the last one then it seemed to stop and began dimming to a faint red color and vanished shortly before reaching the tree line in the distance. i was kind of alarmed when the second one showed up and i waited for a 3rd for a couple of minutes but i had to get to work.
content.summary: Bright red-orange light, much larger than the front light of a plane, slow moving, much like a fire ball. it moved past the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I left the house to follow the sound of live music coming from either the boulder county fair; or more likely, the left hand brewery. there were boisterous teenagers with skateboards in the vicinity. as i began to head southbound on sunset ave, i immediately saw above the south horizon a cluster of white orbs, the three most prominent (brightest, largest) were central to the group and held the ubiquitous triangle formation! i asked the pack of teens as i rolled past on my bicycle: "you see funny lights in the sky?" one said "well, yeah". 
 ok, so i roll down the hill passing roger rd, the county fair in the distance to my right(west) and the brewery to my left(east)... as i approach nelson rd it becomes harder to track the orb cluster, i am leveling out, & trees block much of the action. @10:37 i get to sunset & pratt and call a friend to tell him "if he really wants to see these things, 'now' would be the time". he declines, -already gone to bed. i continue on sunset, southbound and climbing the crest, pull behind a school, not much visibility there, return to the road, and as i reach the high point, can see the last of the objects dispersing over the suburbs of denver. they just floated on down over the city lights like they were 'on sortie' or something... la la la la la...
 i went back to the schoolgrounds and tried to capture footage over the darkened field as the objects that broke easterly lingered by the treeline horizon. at some point there was a formation that resembled the letter "l" to the south, possibly they were the ones from the triangle form. i think that some of the group wheeled around back north, but by that point they seemed to blend in with commercial air traffic. my impression is that mimicry is a part of their behavior. when one began to come my way, i felt perhaps like someone who likes to go swimming with the sharks.  
as i head back north, i continued filming 'planes' around the area, to see if any exhibit unusual behavior; my phone camera will simply not suffice for this purpose though.
 - from st vrain greenway i saw a fat bright falling star in the east promptly followed by another. by midnight, i had re-traced the first part of my path in a genuine sense of wonderment.  
 i am the author of case # 48506: three amber lights, and this is turning out to be an interesting season for orb spotting!.
content.summary: Either a fleet of craft, or family of flying electric jellyfish, or ???

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:50pm on saturday august 2nd 2013, my wife and i saw an unknown object project what appeared be a beam multiple times as it traversed the sky. it traveled straight in a west/nw direction. it would be about the same illumination as a high plane at night then suddenly light up brilliantly as if projecting a beam or "bursting" into flame. i watched the object travel for about 45secs to a min. almost reminded me of meteor footage i've seen but moved way to slowly for a meteor.
content.summary: Beam projecting object

content.detailedDescription: We were going to ocala and i saw small red lights out my side window about 5 to 10 and a plane or chopper behind them as they went over us we could not see them after they pass over us there was no sound coming from the lights or the plane or chopper but there was a line coming off the plane or chopper we pulled off the road  and watch the plane or chopper go away but could not see the lights.  can you tell me what i saw. ufo or drones with a plane or chopper behind the lights? thanks
content.summary: We were going to work, saw these lights passed over us and went on their way

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking  the dogs in the dark neighborhood
2. staring at the stars while walking dogs and, it grabbed my attention.
3. thought it was something on fire in the sky (plane, meteor? based on size and color) but it moved too perfectly, slowly...
4. big orange/yellow fire-type ball moved slowly and purposefully from se to nw getting lower and lower until it disappeared below the tree line.
5. im a huge outdoors person.  i have lived in the woods all my life and stare at the sky often.  this was the most unusual thing i've ever seen.  i was so curious, confused and perplexed that i had to drag the poor doggies back up the neighborhood so i could follow it.
6.Extremely disappointed. i didn't want to stop watching it, but it disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow (firey) ball moved slowing decending into tree line

content.detailedDescription: Well my family and i was going to clean up a car deal ship office up it was late in the evening around 7 p.M. all the family had went in to the deal ship   for some reason my bro. and i was the last two get out so we was just about to go in when i look up and there was a this big thing in right above us we look at it and look at each other. we did not know what to do we watch it for about five mins. it just set there turn around and around did not move just spend around and around i told my bro to go get our mom and dad. but we said about time we get them it might be going so watch it for about another mins. and it just easy all just like that it was going up until now my bro and never told no one we said to each other if we told some one this they will call us crazy. we never told our my of day title this day. so we just went in and went to work
content.summary: My self and family was get read to go and clean up a car deal ship office.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way to dallas, tx.
i was in the backseat of the car, while my grandparents were in the front.
we were about 20-30 minutes away from dallas, and were away from the city. sort of in a woods area on the highway, nothing but mainly trees. no stores or anything. i was looking outside the window, just looking at the stars. the sky was a very dark navy blue color. then i saw the ufo. it seemed to be going slower than what a plane would go in the sky. it was a triangle shape, with 3 bright white lights on each tip. the two lights in the back pulsated. i knew it was triangular shaped, because the 3 lights were at the tips of the triangle, and i could see the pitch-black triangle shape, against the dark navy-blueish sky. i'm not sure how big the object could've been, but from what i can remember, it seemed far away. kind of like if you were holding a penny up, that's how big it could be in the sky. i was really stunned. i'm still wondering what it could be.. i finally lost sight if the object after a couple minutes, because the car was driving forward, and the ufo was going the opposite direction we were moving in.. has anyone seen a ufo like that? i'm really curious and really do want answers.. thanks.
content.summary: Triangle in sky with three white lights. two lights in back pulsating.

content.detailedDescription: Aug. 3, 2013-5:10 a.M. dundee, michigan a light as bright as venus moving in an erratic manner (stationary then appeared to jump). the direction changed from south east to south west then back to south east. it looked as to be making a u turn then made a 180 degree turn back to south east. this went on for approx. 2 minutes. we first thought it was a satellite until the direction changed and jumped. it was approx. 10 o'clock in the sky when we first saw it and 2 o'clock when it went over the building and out of sight. there was no blinking lights. i have no idea what it was or the altitude of this object. we are not far from detroit metro and we see many planes in the sky, this was not a plane. this thing was a lot higher in the sky than most of the planes we see. i do not understand the jumping or changing directions. any ideas what this might have been?
content.summary: Bright star-like object stop then jumped,stopped,jumped and changing directions many times

content.detailedDescription:
It's still hanging there and everyoine on our street is watching it.
i went inside after i noticed they didn;t move at all for some time and took a video.
this might not be a big deal, but i always thought ufo guys were just bored or retired.
this needs to be seen or at least would like an explanation on the news at 11pm tonight.

i was outside airing out my crotch
they didn't move
drones from creech afb
falshing light in a string that hover and are still hovering
just kind of curious
i didn't as they are still there

everyone in vegas has to see this, it's just too big and obvious
content.summary: Long string of stationary lights like phoenix sightings years ago

content.detailedDescription: This was the night of august 3 and i was in my room sleeping and my parents in another. it was quiet until i couldn't sleep anymore and i looked at the clouds, there i saw these lights that were hovering and playing "chase" with each other and i thought i was hallucinating so with doubt i called on my parents. they saw what i did and we tried to capture it on the lphone camera but the background was too dark, since the light fuse of my room was out. it was sensational to be sharing my experience to others.      so. bi. 21.  queens,ny
content.summary: These were 2 dots of hovering light blue and green each. they were revolving around the clouds as if in a chasing game.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside talking my neighbor, i saw a light traveling south to north... it stopped and i told my neighbor that the star we were looking at had just been moving and was not a star��� we stood talking for a while, and after about 15 minutes it started to move again��� 
it went in a fairly straight line from south to north west but zigzags slightly! at first it was moving fairly fast��� and then it slowed and began to fade, it looked like it was sitting still again but the just faded until we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Saw a light traveling south to north... it stopped for 15 minutes and moved again.....

content.detailedDescription: Driving eastbound on the beltline at 9:55 pm. saw 2 bright orange/red fireballs hovering over the beltline. exited on midvale, picked up my husband and parked on midvale outside an elementary school. then my husband and i witnessed 3 fireballs. they were large enough to be an aircraft and lower than the airplane towers nearby. the fireballs were significantly different than the red lights on the airplane towers. they were glowing intensely. they were moving very slowly southwest toward the fitchburg/verona area. two of the fireballs were in very close proximity to each other, the 3rd was further away and moving a little faster. we got back in our car and tried to drive closer to them and then lost sight of them behind trees. they seemed to be moving together or in a formation.
content.summary: 3 orange/red fireballs hovering over madison, wi.

content.detailedDescription:
Enormous dark triangle, flashing lights, banking over tree line, moving slow and silent,


        we were on our way home, 9:29pm aug 3, 2013, in independence missouri,  we were driving down 24 hwy east, my mom noticed out of corner of her eye some flashing lights. she asked us what it was.  when we looked at it we knew we weren't seeing anything we have ever seen before. the feeling was exciting and we were curious as to what this object was and we tried to chase it. lost sight of ufo) due to distance and tree line.
we need you to pull the video. sorry we do not know how.
content.summary: Driving home

content.detailedDescription: I observed what looked like a green fireball shoot like a rocket horizontally parallel to the ground about 10 metres high off the ground. it lasted about 3 seconds and disappeared, there was no noise. it was 8 pm - still broad daylight and i was walking out of stanley park - there were a few cars driving by but i'm not sure whether they noticed anything - it was very fast. it seemed like such a natural thing to see that i first thought it was a shooting star. my second thought was that shooting stars cannot be seen in daylight and not so low to the ground and certainly not neon green! i didn't think about it again till today when i found a note in wikipedia about green fireballs http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/green_fireballs i'm still not certain what i saw can be described as a fireball but it was rocketing green neon ball of light that disappeared into nothing - quite low to the ground.
content.summary: Green fireball sighting at the edge of stanley park in vancouver bc canada

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from a poker game with a blind friend, driving southbound on i-69 between dewitt and lansing mi.  i noticed numerous lights south of me, heading in a northwest direction. my best estimate would be that there were about 60 lights slowly moving in formation.  it wasn't really an organized formation but everything seemed to be drifting in the same direction. when i first glanced upwards i figured they were a bunch of bright stars but had to do a double take .... they were way too low, like below the cloudline low and they were packed together in something like a swarm.  i slowed down and described everything to my friend .... missing my exit in the process.  i had never seen anything like this and was a little shaken. eventually we drove out of range and lost sight of them.  i dropped my friend off and told him to keep an eye on the news and listen to a police scanner to see if he hears anything odd.  i got home and told my wife about everything and she's making me fill this out.
content.summary: Driving southbound i-69 in clinton county mi ...... numerous starlike lights slowly traveling just below the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband had just come home from work and was in the back yard with our dog kicking the ball around.  something in the sky caught his eye and he first thought it was just a plane with the sun reflecting off it since it was a sunny day.  but he realized it seemed really bright so he took another look and realized quickly that the object wasn't moving at all.  he could see some high clouds moving behind it but the object itself was not moving.  we have two very tall trees in the backyard and the object was viewed in the space between.  he couldn't give much of an estimate on the altitude of the object but it appeared to be where a small local aircraft might be seen.  

he had trouble believing what he was seeing and he kind of closed his eyes and shook his head for a second and when he looked again it was gone.  he moved about the yard to look past the two trees but it was nowhere to be found in the sky.

he felt silly describing it because it sounded so cliche, but my husband is a huge skeptic so i believed him when he drew it out showing an oval/disc like shape either with windows or some kind of markings on the side.  he said it was very bright, brighter than any reflection of sun should have been.  

when i came home from work he showed me where he had seen it.  i'm a lover of planes and flight patterns so i understand that planes may appear stationary for a few moments if they're flying directly towards or away from you but eventually you will see the movement.  the area of sky where he had seen the object would not have obstructed him from seeing a plane continue it's path if that were the case...There was a ton of sky.  the object simply disappeared.

my husband gets chills over his entire body when he talks about it.  he felt blessed to witness this event (on his birthday no less, lol) and he feels perfectly confident in what he had seen.  he doesn't feel the need to broadcast it, although he's not embarrassed to discuss it, he's simply taking it as an amazing chance encounter that he was happy to witness.
content.summary: Hovering oval shaped object over treeline in croydon, pa

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking from our house to our barn when we looked above the treeline and saw a light-colored reflective cylindrical craft flying from east to northeast. the sky was clear with no clouds, the temperature was right at 80 degrees, the humidity at 52%, and the wind was at nw 8 miles per hours. 

the motion of the object caught our attention above the trees along our ridge . at first we assumed it was a plane, but as we kept watching it we both agreed we could not see any wings, tail, or insignia on the object. it made no noise and left no trail. it flew at a high rate of speed silently in a direct line with no abrupt changes of direction. it disappeared above and behind the trees within approximately 30 seconds. we could not locate it again when we went up our driveway on the ridge to try to see it again.   

our reaction was wonderment of what we had just observed. it was unlike any flying object we have seen before including jets, prop planes, helicopters, hot air balloon, ultralights, or blimps. we absolutely could not identify this flying object.
content.summary: Reflective silver object at high altitude travelling to the northeast at high rate of speed with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with our dogs watching the sky as we saw a couple of shooting stars to see a strange red ball of red move swiftly in a perfect straight line across the sky. the object did not leave a trail or flicker it just kept colour and line and speed of movement until out of sight. a few minutes later a second identical object moved along the same flight path. both objects were identical and were 100% not a plane, we live close to flight paths and know what a plane in the sky looks like. these objects left both my wife and i, and my mother who also witnessed the objects, lost for an explanation as to what we saw. very cool.
content.summary: Large bright red ball moved fast from nw to ne in a steady straight line. followed by a second a few minutes apart.

content.detailedDescription:
It was august 1st 2013, 9:47p.M., and i was sitting out on my balcony at night with my friend when we noticed a bright orange light over the ocean. at first it didn't seem out of the ordinary because there are always lights from buoys, boats, planes, beach patrol, etc. this light was much larger than anything we have seen over the ocean before and it wasn't blinking like other lights i normally see out there. it could not have been an airplane or helicopter because it moved to slow  and we could not hear an engine or anything. it was silent . there was a lighting storm coming from the northwest at the time. this looked nothing like what a storm produces.

it started out large and nearly along the horizon (i'm not sure whether or not it actually when into the water at all or if it came out of the water)it went diagonally up into the sky at a steady pace for about a minute and got smaller as it made it's way up there, and hung there for another minute or two before it moved farther away and faded behind clouds. the entire time it changed from dark red, to orange and yellow. almost like fire. my friend and i were stunned, we both knew it was something completely out of the ordinary. we ran inside to tell our moms right as it faded the first time. they came out soon after and saw it right before it went out of the balcony's view, when it was small enough to look like a star that was slowly moving. this is when i made a short and unsteady video.

we wonder if anyone else had seen this strange event. with hundreds of condos on the beach someone else must have seen this.
content.summary: Orange\red glowing light started at horizon over ocean. it moved up and then diagonally up over the ocean from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on the porch when we noticed a bright orange object flying. i never saw anything like the object before.  it was spherical in shape and emitted an orange glow.  the object was moving steadily from the sw to the ne at variable speeds, at times ascending and then descending.  four objects were seen in total travelling in the same direction approximately a minute or two apart in similar paths.  the objects disappeared from our field of view.  all of us were stunned and surprized as we had never observed anything like this.
content.summary: Myself and 2 others saw bright orange spherical objects moving in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As an emergency doctor, i saw a female after motorcycle  injury. i ordered xray images which are suggestive. 
i certify this images was taken by an x-ray technician by using a general electric dxr 750 ii x-ray generator. processed in kodak x-omat 2000. external phisionomy si not different of human beings. 
the patient was nude and consciousness. the ct scan images didn't showed any other images. 
please note i do not saw any object.
content.summary: Radiological images suggestive of human like.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and son had dogs outside for potty. wife called me outside to see strange light in sky. went outside and saw glowing orange ball coming across sky with what looked like fire coming from top pointing upward moving slowely.As i watched another one appeared behind first one.Flashed light at it several times in sequence of 5 .Second object responded with same amount of flashes.Went across sky and disappeared over hill. no flashing lights like a plane would have ,no running lights also.Really enjoyed seeing it.
content.summary: 2 glowing orange balls moving slowely across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking by free school street near new market in the city of kolkata, wb at around 9:10 of tuesday 30 of july, 2013. i was going to the north west, when this happened. 

i saw it pass very swiftly to the west, sharply, over the street some 100 yards or more from me and looked at an altitude of 130~ ft. but because of the buildings couldn't see it except for two seconds. like five to ten seconds later a plane passed following it.

it looked like a flattened egg of blue/white color with flashing/glowing surface and letting a quite large trace, of the size of the object or whereabouts.

i ran towards the corner to have a better sight, and when i reached it the  plane had swerved to the northwest and the craft was no more there. the buildings didn't let me see much. i ran to the building where i'm staying and tried to go to the rooftop to see, but the door was padlocked.
content.summary: Ufo sight over kolkata's downtown
